event.description: Gorkys Hernandez flies out to right fielder Chris Owings in foul territory.
Brandon Belt grounds out, shortstop Nick Ahmed to first baseman Paul Goldschmidt.
Hunter Pence triples (1) on a sharp fly ball to right fielder Chris Owings.
Buster Posey lines out to first baseman Paul Goldschmidt.
Brandon Crawford flies out to center fielder A. J. Pollock.
Eduardo Nunez singles on a line drive to center fielder A. J. Pollock.
With Jarrett Parker batting, Eduardo Nunez steals (3) 2nd base.
Jarrett Parker pops out to third baseman Jake Lamb.
Joe Panik singles on a ground ball to second baseman Brandon Drury. Eduardo Nunez scores.
Matt Moore grounds out, second baseman Brandon Drury to first baseman Paul Goldschmidt.
Gorkys Hernandez called out on strikes.
Brandon Belt triples (1) on a line drive to right fielder Chris Owings.
Hunter Pence singles on a sharp ground ball to left fielder Yasmany Tomas. Brandon Belt scores.
Buster Posey singles on a line drive to center fielder A. J. Pollock. Hunter Pence to 3rd.
Brandon Crawford out on a sacrifice fly to left fielder Yasmany Tomas. Hunter Pence scores.
Eduardo Nunez grounds out, third baseman Jake Lamb to first baseman Paul Goldschmidt.
Jarrett Parker strikes out on a foul tip.
Joe Panik strikes out swinging.
Matt Moore strikes out swinging.
Gorkys Hernandez grounds out, second baseman Brandon Drury to first baseman Paul Goldschmidt.

Brandon Belt strikes out swinging.
Chris Herrmann remains in the game as the left fielder.
Pitching Change: J. Hoover replaces Jorge De La Rosa, batting 9th, replacing Daniel Descalso.
Hunter Pence grounds out, shortstop Nick Ahmed to first baseman Paul Goldschmidt.

Pitching Change: Andrew Chafin replaces J. Hoover, batting 9th.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch-hitter Aaron Hill replaces Conor Gillaspie.

Pitching Change: Fernando Rodney replaces Tom Wilhelmsen, batting 9th.

Jake Lamb grounds out, third baseman Eduardo Nunez to first baseman Brandon Belt.
Yasmany Tomas singles on a ground ball to left fielder Jarrett Parker.

D-backs challenged (play at 1st), call on the field was overturned: Brandon Drury grounds into a force out, shortstop Brandon Crawford to second baseman Joe Panik. Yasmany Tomas out at 2nd. Brandon Drury to 1st.
Chris Iannetta flies out to right fielder Hunter Pence.
Nick Ahmed grounds out, pitcher Matt Moore to first baseman Brandon Belt.
